After taking the stage to the pop music hit "Simply the Best," Dick Cheney was met with shouts of "war criminal" and where's bin Laden? The heckles appeared to come from a contingent of supporters of libertarian Republican Ron Paul . The Ron Paul group walked out of the room as Dick Cheney began to speak. What: Barbara Walters , who had her own surgery to repair a faulty heart valve last year, addresses heart disease and the fear many have of a heart operation in A Matter of Life and Death. She talks to former Bill Clinton , David Letterman , Robin Williams and Regis Philbin , celebrities who've had heart surgeries. She also talks to doctors, including her own, about prevention and the warning signs of heart trouble.
